extension_description.message: Txhais cov ntawv xaiv ntawm nplooj ntawv web thiab hloov mus rau hom ntawv teev tseg.

turn_off_description.message: Lub pob txhais lus yuav popup txhua zaus xaiv cov ntawv nyeem

turn_on_description.message: Txhais lus khawm yuav tsis tshwm thaum ntawv xaiv tab sis koj tseem tuaj yeem txhais tau los ntawm txhaj rau Pro Translate icon hauv toolbar

target_language_description.message: Xaiv lub hom phiaj hom lus

auto_switch.message: Hloov mus rau hom lus thib ob

auto_switch_description.message: Thaum cov ntawv xaiv yog hom hom lus, txhais nws rau hom lus thib ob

second_target_language_description.message: Xaiv hom lus thib ob lub hom phiaj

target_format_description.message: Xaiv lub hom phiaj lub hom phiaj, hom ntawv tuaj yeem hloov pauv hauv vaj huam sib luag txhais lus

auto_set_format_description.message: Thaum hloov hom ntawv hauv vaj huam sib luag txhais lus, teeb tsa cov hom ntawv xaiv rau hom ntawv qub

format_and_order.message: Kev txhais vaj huam sib luag hom ntawv thiab kev txiav txim

format_and_order_description.message: Format cov rooj plaub uas tuaj yeem hloov pauv hauv vaj huam sib luag txhais lus thiab tso saib kev txiav txim

translate_button_off.message: Tsis txhob qhia khawm txhais lus
